templates.question: How is STORE/LOCATION/CITY ranked amongst all stores
templates.desc: STORE/LOCATION/CITY store ranking compared to other stores
templates.query: WITH RANKS AS (SELECT L.LOCATION_LABEL, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(REVENUE_DOLLARS_TY) DESC ) AS LOCATION_RANK FROM ARMETA_AI.DASHBOARD.STORY_RETAIL_SALES_ANALYSIS A JOIN ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_LOCATION L ON A.LOCATION_CD = L.LOCATION_CD GROUP BY L.LOCATION_LABEL ) SELECT L.LOCATION_LABEL, R.LOCATION_RANK FROM DASHBOARD.STORY_RETAIL_SALES_ANALYSIS A JOIN ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_LOCATION L ON A.LOCATION_CD = L.LOCATION_CD JOIN RANKS R ON R.LOCATION_LABEL = L.LOCATION_LABEL GROUP BY L.LOCATION_LABEL, R.LOCATION_RANK

templates.question: How is STORE/LOCATION/CITY ranked amongst all stores
templates.desc: Breakdown of STORE/LOCATION/CITY's comparative store rank
templates.query: WITH RANKS AS (SELECT L.LOCATION_LABEL, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(REVENUE_DOLLARS_TY) DESC ) AS LOCATION_RANK FROM ARMETA_AI.DASHBOARD.STORY_RETAIL_SALES_ANALYSIS A JOIN ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_LOCATION L ON A.LOCATION_CD = L.LOCATION_CD GROUP BY L.LOCATION_LABEL ) SELECT L.LOCATION_LABEL, R.LOCATION_RANK FROM DASHBOARD.STORY_RETAIL_SALES_ANALYSIS A JOIN ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_LOCATION L ON A.LOCATION_CD = L.LOCATION_CD JOIN RANKS R ON R.LOCATION_LABEL = L.LOCATION_LABEL GROUP BY L.LOCATION_LABEL, R.LOCATION_RANK

templates.question: How is STORE/LOCATION/CITY ranked amongst all stores

templates.query: WITH RANKS AS (SELECT L.LOCATION_LABEL, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(REVENUE_DOLLARS_TY) DESC ) AS LOCATION_RANK FROM ARMETA_AI.DASHBOARD.STORY_RETAIL_SALES_ANALYSIS A JOIN ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_LOCATION L ON A.LOCATION_CD = L.LOCATION_CD GROUP BY L.LOCATION_LABEL ) SELECT L.LOCATION_LABEL, R.LOCATION_RANK FROM DASHBOARD.STORY_RETAIL_SALES_ANALYSIS A JOIN ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_LOCATION L ON A.LOCATION_CD = L.LOCATION_CD JOIN RANKS R ON R.LOCATION_LABEL = L.LOCATION_LABEL GROUP BY L.LOCATION_LABEL, R.LOCATION_RANK

templates.question: How is STORE/LOCATION/CITY ranked amongst all stores
templates.desc: Analytical view of STORE/LOCATION/CITY's rank amidst all stores
templates.query: WITH RANKS AS (SELECT L.LOCATION_LABEL, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(REVENUE_DOLLARS_TY) DESC ) AS LOCATION_RANK FROM ARMETA_AI.DASHBOARD.STORY_RETAIL_SALES_ANALYSIS A JOIN ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_LOCATION L ON A.LOCATION_CD = L.LOCATION_CD GROUP BY L.LOCATION_LABEL ) SELECT L.LOCATION_LABEL, R.LOCATION_RANK FROM DASHBOARD.STORY_RETAIL_SALES_ANALYSIS A JOIN ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_LOCATION L ON A.LOCATION_CD = L.LOCATION_CD JOIN RANKS R ON R.LOCATION_LABEL = L.LOCATION_LABEL GROUP BY L.LOCATION_LABEL, R.LOCATION_RANK

templates.question: What is the category with the biggest sales opportunity at STORE/LOCATION/CITY?
templates.desc: The category with the biggest or most sales opportunity at STORE/LOCATION/CITY
templates.query: WITH Find_LocationName AS (SELECT TOP 1 LOCATION_LABEL, REGEXP_SUBSTR(LOCATION_DESC, '[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z ]+') AS LOCATION_DESC FROM ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_LOCATION L WHERE RTRIM(LTRIM(LOWER(LOCATION_DESC))) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER('STORE/LOCATION/CITY'), '%') ), Find_TopCategory AS (SELECT CATEGORY_LABEL, LOCATION_LABEL, SUM(OPPS) AS OPPORTUNITY FROM ARMETA_AI.DASHBOARD.STORY_SALES_ACCELERATOR SA JOIN ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_CATEGORY C ON SA.CATEGORY_CD = C.CATEGORY_CD JOIN ARMETA_AI.STORY.LKP_LOCATION L ON SA.LOCATION_CD = L.LOCATION_CD WHERE OPPS IS NOT NULL GROUP BY CATEGORY_LABEL, LOCATION_LABEL ORDER BY OPPORTUNITY DESC ) SELECT CATEGORY_LABEL, OPPORTUNITY FROM Find_LocationName LN JOIN Find_TopCategory TC ON LN.LOCATION_LABEL = TC.LOCATION_LABEL ORDER BY OPPORTUNITY DESC
